state: The dinner is almost ready! It's only missing a grilled milk. -= Bedroom =- I am excited to announce that you are now in the bedroom. You see a closed chest drawer. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the king-size bed. There is a closed wooden door leading east. > -= Bedroom =-0/1
